arabic_text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ
translation: (8) And We did not make them [i.e., the prophets] forms not eating food,[873] nor were they immortal [on earth].
footnotes: [873]- Like the angels.  Rather, they were human beings with human attributes.
